div.p: ANTONIO: At this point I 'm going to ask you to do just one more activity â€“ I'd like you to take a few minutes to write a letter.
ANTONIO: Think of a special person in your life; someone who's important to you. And imagine a time in this person's life when there will be opportunities for drinking and drug use.
ANTONIO: Maybe they're entering high school, going away to college, going into the military, or moving away from home.
ANTONIO: Or, you may want to write your letter to a friend or family member who is already experiencing problems with alcohol or drugs.
ANTONIO: Write this letter about things you want to share with them regarding their alcohol and drug choices.
ANTONIO: My only requests are that you write your letter from the heart, and that you include at least three things you have learned in this program.
